page.title: 04ENTERTAINMENT IN LINTON
page.content: In Linton there are various forms of Entertainment. The most popular form of Entertainment for the ages of 6_19 is the Youth Club.There are chances to watch television,play Pool and Snooker,drink,go on trips,play Football and Netball,talk and go to Discos and also to play Darts.People said that they would like to go on more trips. Other people who were asked said that they go to the COLLEGE for various activities.Some of these are Yoga,educational lessons,plays, concerts and a toddler group. There are SIX pubs in Linton.In some pubs they have competitions.They are inter_pub Snooker,Pool and Darts.These are very popular.
